product_name: Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Tube Cube
long_description: Organize and compress your clothing with the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Tube Cube, designed to tuck neatly into those awkward spaces inside your wheeled luggage. Made of washable, odor-resistant polyester with a mesh top so you can see what's inside. Compresses either folded or rolled socks, underwear, stockings, belts and more. 2-way zippered opening makes it easy to open and close when fully packed. Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Tube Cube measures 10 in. x 4 in. x 2 in. Pack-It Cubes are also available in other sizes.
short_description: Organize and compress your clothing with the Eagle Creek Original Pack-It Half Tube Cube, designed to tuck neatly into those awkward spaces inside your wheeled luggage.
